trans-unit.source: Represents a control that enables a user to select a date by using a visual calendar display.
trans-unit.target: 代表可讓使用者使用視覺化月曆顯示來選取日期的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Calendar control can be used on its own, or as a drop-down part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> control.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用日曆控制項，其本身，或為下拉式清單的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Calendar supports only the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 行事曆支援西曆日曆。

trans-unit.source: The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the Calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下表提供工作通常與月曆相關聯的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: |Task|Implementation| |----------|--------------------| |Have the Calendar display a month, an entire year, or a decade.|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> property to Month, Year, or Decade.| |Specify whether the user can select a date, a range of dates, or multiple ranges of dates.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>.| |Specify dates that cannot be selected.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates%2A> property.| |Specify the range of dates that the Calendar displays.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.| |Specify whether the current date is highlighted.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |工作 |實作 | |----------|--------------------| |已經顯示每個月、 年或十年以上行事曆。 |將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>屬性設定為月份、 年份或 Decade。 | |指定使用者是否可以選取日期的日期範圍或多個範圍的日期。 |使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>。 | |指定的日期無法選取。 |使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates%2A>屬性。 | |指定的行事曆顯示的日期範圍。 |使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>屬性。 | |指定目前的日期會反白顯示。 |使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> is `true`.| |Change the size of the Calendar.|Use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> or set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A>是`true`。 | |變更行事曆的大小。 |使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>或設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>屬性至<xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> properties of a Calendar, the actual calendar does not change its size.| The Calendar control provides basic navigation using either the mouse or keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>和行事曆，實際的行事曆<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>屬性不會變更其大小。 | 月曆控制項提供使用滑鼠或鍵盤的基本巡覽。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: 下表摘要說明的鍵盤巡覽。

trans-unit.source: |Key Combination|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>|Action| |---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| |ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>.| |ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |按鍵組合 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>|動作 | |---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| |箭號 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性未設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性。 | |箭號 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|變更的月份<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，不會變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>。 | |箭號 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>年份</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |SHIFT+ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>, extends the range of selected dates.| |HOME|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> to the first day of the current month.| |HOME|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the first month of the year.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，不會變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>。 | |SHIFT + 方向鍵 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|如果設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>不是，擴充選取的日期範圍。 | |首頁 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|變更目前的月份的第一天<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>。 | |首頁 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|變更的月份<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>來年的第一個月。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |HOME|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the first year of the decade.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>不會變更。 | |首頁 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|變更的年份<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>至十年的第一年。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |END|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> to the last day of the current month.| |END|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the last month of the year.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>不會變更。 | |結束 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|變更目前的月份的最後一天<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>。 | |結束 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|變更的月份<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>年度的上個月。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |END|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the last year of the decade.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>不會變更。 | |結束 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|變更的年份<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>至十年的最後一年。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |CTRL+UP ARROW|Any|Switches to the next larger <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>不會變更。 | |CTRL + 向上鍵 |任何 |切換至下一個較大<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> is already <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, no action.| |CTRL+DOWN ARROW|Any|Switches to the next smaller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>，採取任何動作。 | |CTRL + 向下箭號 |任何 |切換至下一個較小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> is already <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, no action.| |SPACEBAR or ENTER|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Switches <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> represented by focused item.| ## Customizing the Calendar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Calendar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>，採取任何動作。 | |空白鍵或 ENTER |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|交換器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>或已取得焦點的項目所代表的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>。 | # # 自訂行事曆控制項至相同的屬性設定套用到多個日曆控制項，使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Calendar, see [Calendar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和專屬於行事曆的狀態，請參閱[行事曆樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Calendar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在行事曆控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 物件項目用法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 取得會標示為無法選取的日期集合。

trans-unit.source: Dates in this collection will appear gray and crossed out on the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的日期會出現灰色和交錯出行事曆。

trans-unit.source: To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A> method provided by the collection returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓所有過去的日期不能選取，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>這個屬性所傳回的集合所提供的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* One or more object elements of type .
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性項目用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* .類型的一或多個物件項目

trans-unit.source: A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 日期無法選取的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> associated with the control's internal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>與相關聯控制項的內部<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date to display.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示的日期。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayDate and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> properties specify what the calendar displays and what has focus within the calendar.
trans-unit.target: DisplayDate 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>屬性會指定行事曆的顯示和何者得到焦點內行事曆。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> only when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> is set to Month, but the user might change the DisplayDate when the Calendar is in Year and Decade mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>設為 Month，但使用者可能會變更 DisplayDate 行事曆是以年份和十年的模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the mode changes the DisplayDate.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述如何將模式變更 DisplayDate。

trans-unit.source: |DisplayMode|Action| |-----------------|------------| |Month|DisplayDate changes when the user navigates to a different month.| |Year|The month of DisplayDate changes when the user clicks or navigates to a different month.| |Decade|The year of DisplayDate changes when the user clicks or navigates to another year.| DisplayDate is ignored if its value is outside of the range of dates that is specified by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: |DisplayMode |動作 | |-----------------|------------| |月 |當使用者導覽至不同的月份，變更 DisplayDate。 | |年份 |DisplayDate 月份變更當使用者按一下或巡覽至不同的月份。 | |十年 |DisplayDate 年變更當使用者按一下或巡覽至其他年份。 | 如果其值已超出所指定的日期範圍，則會忽略 DisplayDate<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為**true**|| # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*dateTimeString*日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: The date to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的日期。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.Today%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.DateTime.Today%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> is assigned its new value.
trans-unit.target: 之後就會發生此事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>指派新的值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last date in the date range that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可在行事曆中的日期範圍內的最後一個日期。

trans-unit.source: You can restrict the range of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and DisplayDateEnd properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以限制的範圍<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>和 DisplayDateEnd 屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法捲動到，或選取日期超出此範圍。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to a date that is after DisplayDateEnd, DisplayDateEnd is set to the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性的日期，之後 DisplayDateEnd、 DisplayDateEnd 設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>相同的值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為**true**|| # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*dateTimeString*日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: The last date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 使用行事曆中的最後一個日期。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定位於行事曆的第一個日期。

trans-unit.source: You can restrict the range of a Calendar by setting the DisplayDateStart and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定 DisplayDateStart 限制的行事曆範圍和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法捲動到，或選取日期超出此範圍。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to a date that is before DisplayDateStart, DisplayDateStart is set to the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>屬性的日期，是 DisplayDateStart、 DisplayDateStart 就會設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>相同的值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.

trans-unit.source: The first date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 第一個日期，這是用於行事曆。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the calendar displays a month, year, or decade.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示行事曆顯示月份、 年份或十年。

trans-unit.source: A Calendar can display a month, a year, or a decade.
trans-unit.target: 每個月、 年或十年以上，就可以顯示行事曆。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how the user navigates to each mode.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出使用者巡覽至每個模式的方式。

trans-unit.source: |DisplayMode|Action| |-----------------|------------| |Month|To navigate to Year mode, click the month heading.| |Year|To navigate to Decade mode, click the year heading.
trans-unit.target: |DisplayMode |動作 | |-----------------|------------| |月 |若要瀏覽至年模式，按一下 月份標題。 | |年份 |若要瀏覽至十年模式，按一下年份標題。

trans-unit.source: To navigate to Month mode, click one of the displayed months.| |Decade|To navigate to Year mode, click one of the displayed years.| ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**||
trans-unit.target: 若要瀏覽至月份模式，按一下其中一個顯示的月數。 | |十年 |若要瀏覽至年模式，按一下其中一個顯示的年份。 | # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為**true**||

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates what length of time the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> should display.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出哪些的時間長度<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref>應該會顯示。

trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the day that is considered the beginning of the week.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定會被視為一週開始日。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DayOfWeek> that represents the beginning of the week.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DayOfWeek>，代表一週開始。</xref:System.DayOfWeek>

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek*> that is determined by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek*>，取決於目前的文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出目前的日期會反白顯示。

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為**true**|None | # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ```

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current date is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前的日期會反白顯示。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> control when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 建置的視覺化樹狀結構<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref>控制套用新的範本時。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用，每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序，例如重建配置傳遞呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"></xref> for use by the [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/add/includes/silverlight-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"></xref>供[!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/add/includes/silverlight-md.md)]自動化基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> instance if one has not been created for the control instance; otherwise, it returns the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> previously created.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>如果一個執行個體尚未建立控制項執行個體; 否則它會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>之前建立。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> object.

trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayModeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayModeChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>這個控制項沒有焦點時使用者按下按鍵時所發生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> overrides the OnKeyDown method to support keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>覆寫 OnKeyDown 方法，以支援鍵盤導覽。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when a keystroke, such as pressing an ARROW key, performs a navigation action.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`按鍵動作，例如按下方向鍵，當執行瀏覽動作。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user releases a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref>發生於使用者鬆開按鍵，而此控制項有焦點的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A> method to support keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A>方法，以支援鍵盤巡覽。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event data.
trans-unit.target: 此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>事件資料。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of selected dates.
trans-unit.target: 取得所選取的日期集合。

trans-unit.source: Dates can be added to the collection either individually or in a range using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 日期可以加入至集合，個別或在範圍中使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property, adding a date or range to the collection may cause it to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 值而定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>屬性，將加入集合的日期或範圍可能會導致它被清除。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> affects the SelectedDates property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>影響 SelectedDates 屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: |CalendarSelectionMode|Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|No selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: |CalendarSelectionMode |描述 | |---------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|不允許選取。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> cannot be set and no values can be added to SelectedDates.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Only a single date can be selected, either by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> or the first value in SelectedDates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>無法設定並沒有值可加入至 SelectedDates。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|單一日期可以選擇，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>或 SelectedDates 的第一個值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> cannot be used.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|A single range of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>無法使用。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|可以選取單一的日期範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, adding a date individually to SelectedDates, or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will clear all previous values from SelectedDates.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>、 個別附加日期來 SelectedDates，或是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>將會清除所有先前的值從 SelectedDates。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|可以選取多個非連續的日期範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a date individually to SelectedDates or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will not clear SelectedDates.
trans-unit.target: 加入 SelectedDates 個別的日期，或使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>將不會清除 SelectedDates。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> will still clear SelectedDates, but additional dates or ranges can then be added.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>仍將會清除 SelectedDates，但可新增其他的日期或範圍。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.| ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects* One or more object elements.
trans-unit.target: 加入包含已選取的某些日期的範圍或與另一個範圍重疊導致範圍的聯集並不會造成例外狀況。 | # # XAML 屬性項目用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects*一或多個物件項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> object that contains the currently selected dates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>物件，其中包含目前選取的日期。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合時，就會發生<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates*>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates what kind of selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出允許的選項種類。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the current selection mode.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出目前的選取模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*> changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Provides a text representation of the selected date.
trans-unit.target: 提供所選日期的文字表示。

trans-unit.source: A text representation of the selected date, or an empty string if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將選取的日期或空字串的文字表示如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*>
